scripts.deploy: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls deploy
scripts.remove: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls remove
scripts.test-create: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function create --path test/json/create.json
scripts.test-delete: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function delete --path test/json/delete.json
scripts.test-update: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function update --path test/json/update.json
scripts.test-list: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function list --path test/json/list.json
